ALEV NECILE DINC
Alev Necile Dinc, is a noted surrealistic painter and designer for home fashions. She has held over one hundred art exhibitions solo and group, USA and abroad. Born in Turkey, studied painting and design at the Institute of Technology in Ankara, Turkey. After immigrating to the United States, she wanted to become a designer. She continued her education at Fashion Institute of Technology in New York. She studied textile design, also studied graphic design at the Ridgewood Art and Design in NJ. Alev, whose fantasy of painting, frolic in the whimsical world of brilliant color. Her work of art have been described as “transforming” the viewer to a mystical world of beauty and fantasy where everything is vibrant with fluid motion. Her creativity and craftsmanship combine to create dynamic compositions of amazing depth and disarming. The artist extends an invitation to enter into her private dreamscape where ethereal creatures celebrate their existence in vibrant colors and a heartfelt vision.
Alev has exhibited her art in many galleries, institutions and museums.
